meanings.sent1: The teamwork was fruitful in completing the project on time.
meanings.sent2: Her hard work was fruitful, leading to a promotion at work.
meanings.sent3: The fruitful collaboration between the two artists resulted in a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent4: The fruitful discussion among the team members sparked new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The fruitful partnership between the companies brought about great success.

meanings.definition: Producing a large amount of fruit
meanings.sent1: The apple tree in our garden is very fruitful every year.
meanings.sent2: The orchard is known for its fruitful harvest of apples.
meanings.sent3: The fruitful peach tree in the backyard always surprises us with its abundance.
meanings.sent4: The fruitful vineyard produced an exceptional amount of grapes this season.
meanings.sent5: The fruitful lemon tree in the courtyard bears fruit all year round.

meanings.sent1: The old photograph was a fruitful reminder of cherished memories.
meanings.sent2: His words were fruitful, leaving a lasting impact on the audience.
meanings.sent3: The fruitful silence between them spoke volumes about their relationship.
meanings.sent4: The painting was so fruitful, each brushstroke telling a story.
meanings.sent5: The book was a fruitful source of inspiration for aspiring writers.
